items.title: Sparta neemt duidelijk standpunt in over bijna transfervrije topscorer Lauritsen
items.summary: Sparta Rotterdam is niet van plan om Tobias Lauritsen (28) te laten gaan in de winterse transferperiode. PSV werd genoemd als mogelijke bestemming voor de spits, maar mocht de kampioen Lauritsen willen hebben, dan zal zij 'de absolute hoofdprijs' moeten betalen.

That means we have a strong line-up. We know that Conor Bradley is out for a long time. He was progressing and getting better and better. Now, he is injured. But that doesn‚Äôt really help us either. Now, we don‚Äôt have a lot of options with the players that are out. Continue reading...

items.title: VI Live: Van Dijk raakt de lat, Frimpong naar de kant gehaald bij Liverpool
items.summary: In deze VI Live volgen we het gem√™leerde programma in binnen- en buitenland op de voet. De Keuken Kampioen Divisie is terug na de (verlengde) winterstop, verder spelen Liverpool en Paris Saint-Germain in de bekertoernooien.

items.title: Sources: Gallagher set to join Spurs from Atleti
items.summary: Conor Gallagher is set to join Tottenham Hotspur from Atl√©tico Madrid, sources close to the LaLiga club have told ESPN.

items.title: Alonso out at Madrid, Arbeloa to manage club
items.summary: Real Madrid on Monday announced that Xabi Alonso would no longer coach the club "by mutual agreement."

items.title: Ronaldo scores but Al Nassr lose ground to Al Hilal
items.summary: An early goal by Cristiano Ronaldo was not enough as Al Nassr conceded three in the second half in a 3-1 loss to Saudi Pro League leaders Al Hilal on Monday.

items.title: FIFA OKs betting partners to stream WC games
items.summary: FIFA deepened its commercial ties to the betting industry Monday in a four-year deal that will let some gambling operators livestream World Cup games this year.

items.title: USWNT captain Lindsey Heaps signs with Denver
items.summary: United States women's national team captain Lindsey Heaps is heading home in June, when she will return to the NWSL to join expansion side Denver Summit FC.

items.title: NEC wimpelt Duitse interesse in Shiogai af
items.summary: VfL Wolfsburg heeft zich bij NEC gemeld om Kento Shiogai over te nemen. De Bundesliga-club wil de twintigjarige spits deze winter inlijven, maar de Nijmeegse club ziet dat niet zitten. NEC sloeg een bod van Wolfsburg af en is niet van plan om Shiogai gedurende het seizoen te verkopen.

items.title: Mazzelend Jong Ajax stuurt Vitesse bij KKD-herstart terug naar laatste plek
items.summary: Jong Ajax heeft bij de hervatting van het Keuken Kampioen Divisie-seizoen afgerekend met een kansen missend Jong AZ. Door de pas derde overwinning van dit voetbaljaar verlaten de Amsterdamse beloften de laatste plaats op de ranglijst.

items.title: Buitenlandse belangstelling voor opgeleefde PEC-aanvaller De Rooij
items.summary: De winterse transfermarkt is geopend. In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in Nederland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in het buitenland.

items.title: Tottenham bid for Conor Gallagher in push to head off Aston Villa interest
items.summary: Spurs make Atl√©tico Madrid offer worth up to ¬£34.6m Former Chelsea man keen on Premier League return Tottenham are confident of beating Aston Villa to the signing of Conor Gallagher from Atl√©tico Madrid after making an offer worth up to ‚Ç¨40m (¬£34.6m) for the England midfielder. Talks with Atl√©tico are ongoing but Gallagher is understood to be keen to move back to the Premier League to boost his chances of making England‚Äôs World Cup squad, having made just four starts in La Liga this season. Spurs are in the market for midfield reinforcements after Rodrigo Bentancur sustained a hamstring injury that is likely to keep him sidelined for three months. The club have identified the 25-year-old as their primary target. Continue reading...

items.title: Why Alonso's reign is over at Real Madrid
items.summary: After Xabi Alonso's departure as Real Madrid manager, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks into where it all went wrong.

items.title: Skeleton race controversy: Canada defends move amid sabotage claims
items.summary: Canada has launched a robust defence against accusations it deliberately withdrew four athletes from a skeleton race, a move that dashed eventual winner Katie Uhlaender's hopes of qualifying for the Winter Olympics.

items.title: Tottenham close to agreeing Gallagher deal
items.summary: Tottenham are close to agreeing a deal Atletico Madrid to sign Conor Gallagher.

items.title: FA Cup fourth round draw: Macclesfield to host Brentford, Villa face Newcastle
items.summary: Seven Premier League clubs will be visiting lower-league opposition with Chelsea‚Äôs Liam Rosenior returning to his former club Hull City And spare a thought for Palace fans after this weekend ‚Ä¶ Wembley glory in May and despair in January ‚Ä¶ News filtering through that Arne Slot will be taking this game seriously, rather than this time last year when he was run over by Jolly Green Giants. Continue reading...

items.title: Is Carrick the right man for Man Utd?
items.summary: Michael Carrick is favourite to be named Man United's next interim manager. Simon Stone assesses if he is the right fit for the job.

items.title: Macclesfield to host Brentford in FA Cup fourth round - see full draw
items.summary: Sixth-tier Macclesfield are rewarded with a home tie against Brentford in the FA Cup fourth round after their shock win over holders Crystal Palace.

items.title: Macclesfield draw PL opposition as Villa host Newcastle in FA Cup fourth round
items.summary: Macclesfield's reward for beating FA Cup holders Crystal Palace is a home tie against Premier League opposition again in Brentford in the fourth round.

items.title: Race for Guehi wide open with Man City, Liverpool and Arsenal interested
items.summary: The race to sign Marc Guehi is wide open and there is not a favourite or a frontrunner at the moment.
